sentences.en: The amendment prohibits obscene or indecent materials which denigrate the objects or beliefs of a particular religion.
sentences.cn: 该修正案禁止玷污某一宗教客体或信仰的色情或不雅物品。

sentences.en: I didn't intend to denigrate her achievements.
sentences.cn: 我不是想贬低她的成绩。

sentences.en: I write all this not to denigrate the great Huntington.
sentences.cn: 我写这一切不是要贬低伟大的亨廷顿。
